title: Anyone else having trouble with their client since 6.19?
body: Seems like every time I try to fire up league it takes 3-4 tries before it finally gets me logged in and ready to game. Sometimes the client just doesn't show up again after I hit launch. Sometimes it doesn't show up again after i type in my password. Just all around problems w/ the client right now.

replies.body: Thank you kind sir. I'll check that out

It's tough to say exactly what's causing this, because it sounds like you have symptoms of either a security or connection problem.  For example, if you're having a network issue then it can take a bit of time for the launcher to appear as well as establish a connection to our login server.  Since you're not getting any actual errors, I'm inclined to believe that the issue with with your connection.  To know for sure, I suggest going over the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure your network and settings are configured to maintain a stable connection.  Hopefully this will do the trick, but let me know if you have any issues!
